content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

1->2->7

Note: This is the shortest path from the starting node 12 to the target node 6. The path contains 3 nodes. The graph does not contain any loops or multiple edges, so this is the shortest path possible.

1->3->6

Note: This is the shortest path from the starting node 12 to the target node 2. The path contains 2 nodes. The graph does not contain any loops or multiple edges, so this is the shortest path possible.
